title: Disabled shop
body:
Does anyone know when the shop will be back up? I got on yesterday just as it was disabled and wasn't even able to see what I had gotten. I'm seeing a lot of posts about it, and was just wondering if anyone knew
{{sticker:sg-janna}}

replies.body: i just saw it yesterday on my account and today it was gone, what is going on???
The shop went down due to an issue, but we hope to see it return as soon as it can.  Hang tight, it's coming!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=uhxByzyv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-19T18:53:13.068+0000)
>
> The shop went down due to an issue, but we hope to see it return as soon as it can.  Hang tight, it's coming!

Thank you{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
